original: Naajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
Nabahiddhā dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na b a hi ddh ā ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ ajjhatt o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁ekaṃ ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
Nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: ▁na b a hi ddh ārammaṇaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁bahi ddh ārammaṇ o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁dve

original: Naajjhattārammaṇañca nabahiddhārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁na ajjhatt ārammaṇ añca ▁na b a hi ddh ārammaṇ añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ ajjhatt ārammaṇ o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁dve ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate cha.
